Indonesian Language Evaluation Montage

IndoLEM is a comprehensive Indonesian NLP dataset encompassing a broad range of morpho-syntactic, semantic, and discourse analysis competencies. Like GLUE Benchmark, The purpose of IndoLEM is to benchmark progress in Indonesian NLP.

  • >♦ Morpho-syntax and Sequence Labelling Tasks
    • Part-of-speech (POS) tagging
    • Named entity recognition (NER)
    • Dependency parsing
  • ♦ Semantic Tasks
    • Sentiment Analysis
    • Summarization
  • >♦ Discourse Coherence Tasks
    • Next Tweet Prediction
    • Tweet Ordering
Paper:

Fajri Koto, Afshin, Rahimi, Jey Han Lau, and Timothy Baldwin. IndoLEM and IndoBERT: A Benchmark Dataset and Pre-trained Language Model for Indonesian NLP. In Proceedings of the 28th COLING, December 2020.
